full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Example: Combat Knife Procurement

**Tender Details**

* **Reference Number**: cb-830-70326936
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-258459/A
* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 20, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 23, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Tender Information**

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Goods Required**

* **Military Knife or Dagger**: 300 units, as described in the attached tender documents

**Submission Instructions**

* Electronic submissions are strongly encouraged due to reduced business hours and limited staff at the specified bid receiving unit.
* Submissions can be made in either official language of Canada.

**Contract Details**

* **Contracting Entity**: DGAEPM
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Dany Lebel, dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca, (000) 000-0000

**Tender Documents**

* [English Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52238/w8485-258459a-combat-knife-rfp.pdf)
* [French Tender Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/52238/w8485-258459a-couteau-de-combat-ddp.pdf) 

This collaborative bid call is based on the initiative of this government institution, all title contributors can enhance or modify the text freely. La publication de ce texte de même est initiée par cette agence gouvernementale, tous les contributeurs du titre peuvent librement augmenter ou modifier le texte.
